00008 Profile1D::Profile1D(UInt_t id, const HistPar &binning)
00009 {
00010   _obj = new lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl(kNHistogram1DInts,kNHistogram1DFloats,kNHistogram1DDoubles+(binning.nBins()+2)*kNBinTypes) ;
00011   _createdObject=true;
00012   _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram1DId,id);
00013   setBinning(binning);
00014   reset();
00015 }

00035 void Profile1D::reset()
00036 {
00037   _obj->setDoubleVal(kHistogram1DEntries,0.);
00038   for (UInt_t bin_type_i=0; bin_type_i<kNBinTypes; bin_type_i++) {
00039     for (UInt_t bin_i=0; bin_i<=overflowBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00040       setBinContent(bin_type_i,bin_i,0.);
00041     }
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 Float_t Profile1D::mean() const 
00046 {
00047   Double_t a_sum=0; 
00048   Double_t weight_sum=0;
00049   UInt_t bin_i;
00050   Float_t x=xMin();
00051   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00052   x+=x_step*.5;
00053   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00054     a_sum+=sum(bin_i);
00055     weight_sum+=sumOfWeights(bin_i);
00056   }
00057   if (weight_sum>0) {
00058     a_sum/=weight_sum;
00059   }
00060   return a_sum;
00061 }
00062 
00063 Float_t Profile1D::rms() const 
00064 {
00065   Double_t a_sum=0; 
00066   Double_t a_sum2=0; 
00067   Double_t weight_sum=0;
00068   UInt_t bin_i;
00069   Float_t x=xMin();
00070   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00071   x+=x_step*.5;
00072   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00073     a_sum+=sum(bin_i);
00074     a_sum2+=sum2(bin_i);
00075     weight_sum+=sumOfWeights(bin_i);
00076   }
00077   if (weight_sum>0) {
00078       Double_t a_mean=a_sum/weight_sum;
00079     if (weight_sum>1) {
00080       a_sum2=(a_sum2-a_mean*a_sum)/(weight_sum-1);
00081       return sqrt(a_sum2);
00082     }
00083     else {
00084       a_sum2=(a_sum2-a_mean*a_sum)/weight_sum;
00085       return sqrt(a_sum2);
00086     }
00087     
00088   }
00089   else {
00090     return 0.;
00091   }
00092 }

00094 Float_t Profile1D::variance() const 
00095 {
00096   Double_t a_sum=0; 
00097   Double_t a_sum2=0; 
00098   Double_t weight_sum=0;
00099   UInt_t bin_i;
00100   Float_t x=xMin();
00101   Float_t x_step=(xMax()-xMin())/nBins();
00102   x+=x_step*.5;
00103   for (bin_i=firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00104     a_sum+=sum(bin_i);
00105     a_sum2+=sum2(bin_i);
00106     weight_sum+=sumOfWeights(bin_i);
00107   }
00108   if (weight_sum>0) {
00109     Double_t a_mean=a_sum/weight_sum;
00110     a_sum2=(a_sum2-a_mean*a_sum)/weight_sum;
00111     return a_sum2;
00112   }
00113   else {
00114     return 0.;
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Profile1D::calculate() {
00119   for (UInt_t bin_i=underflowBinIndex(); bin_i<overflowBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00120     if (!isCalculated(bin_i)) {
00121       Double_t a_mean=mean(bin_i);
00122       Double_t a_sigma=sigma(bin_i);
00123       setBinContent(kWeightSum,bin_i,-fabs(sumOfWeights(bin_i)));
00124       setBinContent(kSum,bin_i,a_mean);
00125       setBinContent(kSum2,bin_i,a_sigma);
00126     }
00127   }
00128 }
00129 
00130 Double_t Profile1D::sum2(UInt_t bin_index) const
00131 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00132   throw(std::range_error)
00133 #endif
00134 {
00135   if (isCalculated(bin_index)) {
00136     Double_t a_var=binContent(kSum2,bin_index);
00137     a_var*=a_var;
00138     Double_t a_weight_sum=sumOfWeights(bin_index);
00139     if (a_weight_sum>1.) {
00140       a_var*=(a_weight_sum-1.);
00141     }
00142     else {
00143       a_var*=a_weight_sum;
00144     }
00145     Double_t a_mean=mean(bin_index);
00146     a_var+=a_mean*a_mean*a_weight_sum;
00147     return a_var;
00148   }
00149   else return binContent(kSum2,bin_index);
00150 }
